summary_statistics.description: Overall dataset statistics and population summaries

timeseries.description: Population time series by year, genus, and transect

spatial.description: Spatial colony positions for each year (one file per year)

demographic_events.description: Recruitment and mortality events by year

size_frequency.description: Size-frequency distributions by year and genus

color_schemes.description: Color mappings for genera and fates

usage.load_all: Fetch all files on initialization for complete dataset
usage.lazy_load: Fetch spatial data per-year as needed for better performance
usage.recommended: Load summary + timeseries on init, fetch spatial on demand
